name: Plants of Deliverance
description:
This game was made for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 in one week.

Programmer: ObsidianBlk
3D Modeler: ObsidianBlk
2D Artist: Aureolin
Sound Effects:
    Hurt and breathing sounds: ObsidianBlk
    Misc: CC0 from Freesound.org
Main Menu Music: Rise of the Early Dawn - By antonioraymond71

The game was developed on the Godot 4 Engine.

Anyone interested in the source code for this game, it is available at my Github repository
